flawed_nl_solution:
If the art piece was bought at $4000, and its price in three years will be three times its buying price, it will be worth 3*$4000 = $12000 in another three years.
The price of the art piece will increase by $12000-$4000 = $<<12000-4000=8030>>8030

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8000, not 8030. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
